headers.subject: [tosdr:2705] MyKolab provides an opt-out for their Piwik web analytics

html:
We use Piwik to analyze access to this website only. All data is stored on our servers. The IP addresses are anonymized and we do respect your browser's "Do Not Track" preference. However, if you still like to opt-out of being tracked by our own Piwik installation on this website, you can do so here:

Opt-out complete; your visits to this website will not be recorded by the Web Analytics tool. 
Note that if you clear your cookies, delete the opt-out cookie, or if you change computers or Web browsers, you will need to perform the opt-out procedure again. 
  

https://mykolab.com/privacy

Title: MyKolab provides an opt-out for the web analytics they use

Topic: user-info

Summary: MyKolab uses Piwik web analytics to monitor access to their website only. They anonymize the IP address, and respect the "Do Not Track" preference on your browser if you're using that. However, they go a step further and allow you to specifically opt out of their web analytics tool.

Score:  80 (good)

--
tosdr.org | twitter.com/tosdr | github.com/tosdr

subject: MyKolab provides an opt-out for their Piwik web analytics
text:
>
> We use Piwik <http://piwik.org/> to analyze access to this website only. 
> All data is stored on our servers. The IP addresses are anonymized and we 
> do respect your browser's "Do Not Track" preference. However, if you still 
> like to opt-out of being tracked by our own Piwik installation on this 
> website, you can do so here:


Opt-out complete; your visits to this website will not be recorded by the 
Web Analytics tool. 
Note that if you clear your cookies, delete the opt-out cookie, or if you 
change computers or Web browsers, you will need to perform the opt-out 
procedure again. 

 *You are currently opted out. Click here to opt in.* 


https://mykolab.com/privacy
